description: While ransomware attacks decreased after the LockBit and BlackCat disruptions, they have once again started to ramp up with other operations filling the void. [...]
title: The Week in Ransomware - April 19th 2024 -  Attacks Ramp Up

description: CrushFTP warned customers today in a private memo of an actively exploited zero-day vulnerability fixed in new versions released today, urging them to patch their servers immediately. [...]
title: CrushFTP warns users to patch exploited zero-day “immediately”

description: An operator of the HelloKitty ransomware operation announced they changed the name to 'HelloGookie,' releasing passwords for previously leaked CD Projekt source code, Cisco network information, and decryption keys from old attacks.. [...]
title: HelloKitty ransomware rebrands, releases CD Projekt and Cisco data

description: The MITRE Corporation says a state-backed hacking group breached its systems in January 2024 by chaining two Ivanti VPN zero-days. [...]
title: MITRE says state hackers breached its network via Ivanti zero-days

description: ​The United Nations Development Programme (UNDP) is investigating a cyberattack after threat actors breached its IT systems to steal human resources data. [...]
title: United Nations agency investigates ransomware attack, data theft

description: Approximately 22,500 exposed Palo Alto GlobalProtect firewall devices are likely vulnerable to the CVE-2024-3400 flaw, a critical command injection vulnerability that has been actively exploited in attacks since at least March 26, 2024. [...]
title: 22,500 Palo Alto firewalls "possibly vulnerable" to ongoing attacks

description: A new info-stealing malware linked to Redline poses as a game cheat called 'Cheat Lab,' promising downloaders a free copy if they convince their friends to install it too. [...]
title: Fake cheat lures gamers into spreading infostealer malware
